docs.snippet: Two of the country's "Big Three" carpet mills yesterday touched off what is expected to become an industry-wide price revolt against carpet wool suppliers all over the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: Two of the country's "Big Three" carpet mills yesterday touched off what is expected to become an industry-wide price revolt against carpet wool suppliers all over the world.
docs.abstract: Bigelow-Sanford and A Smith halt carpet wool buying in world markets because of soaring prices; co reprs comment

headline.main: BIG CARPET MILLS STOP WOOL BUYING; Revolt Against Soaring Prices Expected to Become General Among U.S. Rug Makers SUBSTITUTES ALSO SCARCE Fiber Blend in World Market Quoted at $2.35 a Pound Was 65c a Year Ago

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO--Travelers who arrive in Rio this week in the course of their South American tours will find the  city jammed and in holiday mood. Wednesday brings the impressive ceremonies of the Presidential inauguration.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO--Travelers who arrive in Rio this week in the course of their South American tours will find the city jammed and in holiday mood. Wednesday brings the impressive ceremonies of the Presidential inauguration.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Jan. 30--After weeks of debate and background maneuver, the Political and Security Committee of the General Assembly tonight approved by a vote of 44 to 7, with 8 abstentions, a United States resolution naming Communist China an...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Jan. 30--After weeks of debate and background maneuver, the Political and Security Committee of the General Assembly tonight approved by a vote of 44 to 7, with 8 abstentions, a United States resolution naming Communist China an aggressor in Korea.
docs.abstract: Peiping reptdly accepts revised Asian-Arab plan; Assembly com defeats Asian-Arab plan; defeats USSR amendments; approves US resolution branding Peiping aggressor and calling for 3-man com to work for peace

headline.main: ASIAN MOVE LOSES; Proposal for 7-Country Peace Talks, Backed by Reds, Rejected ASSEMBLY VOTE IS NEXT American Proposal Also Asks Collective Steps and Effort to Bring About Amity Roll Call on U.S. Plan Fourteen Nations on Body U.N. UNIT DECLARES PEIPING AGGRESSOR Peiping Asked to Quit Korea
